game.name: PAYDAY 2: San Martín Bank Heist
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 앱 내 구매, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The Payday Gang is down in Mexico, preparing to hit a small town bank that has ties to a powerful drug cartel.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Payday Gang is down in Mexico, preparing to hit a small town bank that has ties to a powerful drug cartel.
